```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(results = 'asis');
options(xtable.comment=FALSE)
library(PBImisc)
library(xtable)
library(lattice)
data(kidney)
```


```{r}
lkidney <- reshape(kidney[1:15,], direction = "long", varying = list(9:16), v.names = c("MDRD"), times = c(1/4,1,3,6,12,24,36,60))
lkidney$ltime <- log(lkidney$time)

xyplot(MDRD ~ time | id, lkidney, type=c("g","p","r"), xlab = "time since transplant", ylab = "MDRD", pch=19)
xyplot(MDRD ~ ltime | id, lkidney, type=c("g","p","r"), xlab = "log(time since transplant)", ylab = "MDRD", pch=19)
```
